content:
Overall, I like how organized Zulip is but I don't know where to put messages like "the community call is starting in 2 hours".

Or "have a good weekend!" (I tend to put these in #community > good vibes )

When there's just one channel like we had in IRC or Matrix it was easy to just blurt out stuff like this! :sweat_smile:
Maybe for the container meeting anyway, it could be a call for topics. This what we do every week for tech hours.
Also, I'm using #community > now on DataverseTV as a way to announce new videos on DataverseTV. (I have a few more I'll add soon.)
I just started #community > webinars and posted the first one. Let's see how that goes.
I'm trying #containers > meetings. The topic will never be resolved. We'll just use it for reminders. That's the idea anyway.
